name: Reshoot (TheDutchMagikarp, hucota7, Gembit)
description:
WASD to move, Left click to shoot, Right click to unshoot
Press P to pause the game, Press E to interact

In Reshoot you play as "The Cleaner", an individual tasked with retrieiving bullets that belong to a very unique gun. This gun uses a local form of "Time Inversion" to rewind the state of the bullets and suck them back into the chamber.
